documents.document:
Ebooks available at indiaebooks.com

indiaebooks.com was founded in June 2006 by Esource Software Solution Pvt.Ltd. The site was launched in January 2008.Ebooks from this site can be easily purchased and downloaded immediately by the customers anywhere in the world at prices that are cheaper than the printed books,with no postal charges.

At indiaebooks.com you can-
-> Buy and download a whole book.
-> Buy and download part of a book.
-> Search the entire contents of every ebook on our database by key word, title, author, catagory
etc.
-> Browse book descriptions and indexes and see sample text.
-> an see the preview before buying any ebook.

Upcomings and some ebooks are discussed bellow.

Coming soon on indiaebooks.com Pratiyogita Darpan Monthly Mazagine for career and Competitive Examination. Don't miss it.Login to www.indiaebooks.com

The Ebook-Junior English speaking course By Dr.B.B.Jain describes english language in simple format and is helpful for those who want to learn and speak in english ,now available at www.indiaebooks.com

Meri Awaz Suno ebook by Vinod Viplav Contains rare information and pictures of different aspects of the life and the song of Mohammad Raji.Now is available at www.indiaebooks.com

Ebooks available at indiaebooks.com

1 Advances in Plant Science by Dewasish Choudhary now available at www.indiaebooks.com. Dewasish Choudhary is Professor of Botany in the Department of Plant Science at the Karnataka University. Presently he is engaged in the research of Plant Genetics.

2 Animal Husbandry By Gyan Deep Singh now available at www.indiaebooks.com. This ebook is interested primarily as a text for the basic course in animal industries and farm animals, as the case may be. This ebook should prove useful as a reference book for those involved in livestockproduction.

3 Basics of Agricultural Chemistry by Dewasish Choudhary now available at www.indiaebooks.com. The main aim of the ebook is to facilitate the students in the field of soils, plants, irrigation, water and fertilizers etc. It has been compiled for the practicing chemists in research laboratories and students.

4 Basics of Biotechnology by Sitakanta Behera now available at www.indiaebooks.com. This ebook results from experiences in the laboratory. We intend this ebook to assist students preparing to become biotechnology laboratory professionals and who are arealdy in this profession.

Ebooks at indiaebooks.com

Basics of Biotech in Agriculture By Uma Shankar Singh is available at www.indiaebooks.com. This ebook sums up information about agricultural bio-technology and is a valuable tool for students as well as teachers of all Universities.

Basics of Economic Botany By Ramesh Umrani now available at www.indiaebooks.com. This ebook provides a detailed coverage of the major uses of plants.

Basics of Environmental Chemistry By C.K.Choudhary now available at www.indiaebooks.com. This ebook draw on a range of concepts from chemistry and various environmental sciences to assist in their study of what is happening to a chemical species in the environment.

Basics of Morphology By Ramesh Umrani now available at www.indiaebooks.com. The present title "Basis of Morphology" has been written mainly to meet the need of undergraduate and post graduate students who require a knowledge of a wide field in morphology in an interesting and understandable manner.

Biocontrol of Plant Diseases By Mangat Rai now Available at www.indiaebooks.com.The most significant development with implications for plant pathology is the recent use of plant pathogens to vector genes into plants.

Crop Diseases and Their Control By Mangat Rai now Available at www.indiaebooks.com . This volume presents comprehensive coverage of the cultivation of a improved cultivator possessing the needed disease and insects resistance does not necessarily result in higher sustainable yeilds if inappropriate management is used.

Dairy farming By Uma Shankar Singh now Available at www.indiaebooks.com. This ebook represents an important update of the literature for research workers, lectures, advisers and advance students in many areas of animal science as well as veterinarians concerned with bovine medicine.

Dictionary Of Medicinal Plants By Vijay Verma now Available at www.indiaebooks.com .

Encyclopaedia of Food Technology By Sandhya Trivedi, http://indiaebooks.com/userpages/Detail.aspx?bookId=561. This ebook provides clear and lucid definitions of terms associated with all aspects of food technology and various aspects of food science such as nutririon, diets, food values, different types of food and various processing techniques.

Ebooks @indiaebooks.com

Encyclopaedia of Indian Agriculture Volume 1 at http://indiaebooks.com/userpages/Detail.aspx?bookId=996. Deemed to be the mainstay of a majority og the Indian population, agriculture represents the first endeavour of mankind to control the state resources of the land.

Encyclopaedia of Indian Agriculture Volume 2 at http://indiaebooks.com/userpages/Detail.aspx?bookId=998. Deemed to be the mainstay of a majority og the Indian population, agriculture represents the first endeavour of mankind to control the state resources of the land.

Encyclopaedia of Indian Agriculture Volume 3 at http://indiaebooks.com/userpages/Detail.aspx?bookId=1001. Deemed to be the mainstay of a majority og the Indian population, agriculture represents the first endeavour of mankind to control the state resources of the land.

Encyclopaedia of Research Methodology in Life science Volume 1 at http://indiaebooks.com/userpages/Detail.aspx?bookId=1124. Life science is a broad field that studies life.

Encyclopaedia of Research Methodology in Life science Volume 2 at http://indiaebooks.com/userpages/Detail.aspx?bookId=1126. Life science is a broad field that studies life.

Encyclopaedia of Veterinary science at http://indiaebooks.com/userpages/Detail.aspx?bookId=614. This volume covers all aspects of psychology and its role in society.

Fundamentals Of Food Preparation at http://indiaebooks.com/userpages/Detail.aspx?bookId=624. For a healthy diat, different nutrients have to be taken in a proper proportion.

Health and Food Science at http://indiaebooks.com/userpages/Detail.aspx?bookId=638. For a healthy diat, different nutrients have to be taken in a proper proportion.

Impact of irrigation on Agricultural Production at http://indiaebooks.com/userpages/Detail.aspx?bookId=776. This ebook is intended as a reference book for Post graduate students in economics, agriculture and engineering.

Indian Vegetables By Uma Shankar Singh now at http://indiaebooks.com/userpages/Detail.aspx?bookId=767.The main purpose of this publication is to acquaint both the students of horticulture in general and vegetable crops in particular with the current development on different aspects of vegetable cultivation based on the result of numerous research works throughout the country.

eBooks benefits if purchased from indiaebooks.com

Be a part of indiaebooks and discover the convinience of ebook shopping

Ebooks related to every catagory are found at www.indiaebooks.com

credit card, debit card, internet banking can be used for payments at www.indiaebooks.com

Much cheaper than the hard book, easily downloaded ebooks at www.indiaebooks.com

free registration, book preview and description is available before buying at www.indiaebooks.com

educational, competitive examination books are availabel at www.indiaebooks.com

can find more than 10,000 title at www.indiaebooks.com

we are coming up with e-library concept. www.indiaebooks.com

ebooks

Pest Management - Principles & Practices By Rajesh Ravi http://indiaebooks.com/userpages/Detail.aspx?bookId=816. This ebook is intended to provide a clear overview of the principles and practice of Pest management and serves as a useful sorce of information to the scientists as well as to orchardists and farmers.

Seed Technology & Seed Pathology available at http://indiaebooks.com/userpages/Detail.aspx?bookId=877. This ebook provides up-to-date information relating to recent areas of research in seed technology and seed pathology in the Indian Perspective.

Soil science by Mangat Rai now available at http://indiaebooks.com/userpages/Detail.aspx?bookId=820. This ebook is a proven & successful textbook & works well as assigned reading for university students in the natural science & earth science.

Teacher's Handbook Of Life Science By B.A.Mannan at http://indiaebooks.com/userpages/Detail.aspx?bookId=742. A brief discussion about the activities of teachers.

Textbook Of Agronomy By Gyan Deep Singh available at http://indiaebooks.com/userpages/Detail.aspx?bookId=821. This ebook serves as a textbook for the graduate students and teachers in agricultural institutes & those who are interested in the subject.

The basics of Biology By Deepika Arora available at http://indiaebooks.com/userpages/Detail.aspx?bookId=909. The Basics of Biology is a well-written, non-threatening introduction to biology intended for the common person. It is designed as a reference to allow the reader to understand biological articles, books and news programmes.

Popular ebooks at indiaebooks.com

Benefits to publishers-

1) A new low-cost sales outlet for your books that drives up demand for your titles with no risk of returned books.

2) Full recognisation of your intellectual property rights & for the first time, a for gaining direct payment for the copies of sections of books.

3) The ability to meet demand for all languages books in parts of the world that are not easily accessible through traditional booksellers.

4) More impulse purchases due to the immediate delivery of books to desktop.

5) ebooks stay in print indefinitely, leveraging asats that are darmant today .
